skins.shipDescription: Leander-class light cruiser ¨C Ajax, Hull Number 22!
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Ajax of the Leander class ships. Commander, have you been to Plata river before? I have some wonderful memories there. Hehehe...
skins.acquisition: Commander, I am the 3rd ship of Leander class light cruisers, Ajax. I'm quite famous despite how I look... Commander,
skins.login: Hehe. I'll be having your care again for today, Com~man~der!
skins.details: Commander, do you want to know more about my secrets...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Do you want to have a meal first, or a bath? Or do you want... *giggles*...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'll tell you a secret... Lend me your ear... Pfft! Did that tickle?
skins.secretaryIdle3: When I see you daydreaming, I have this insatiable urge to step on your face...
skins.secretaryTouch: Alright. If you make me feel good, I might 'allow' you something~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: When I think about perverts who touch 'that' spot, I want to step on them!

skins.shipDescription: I'll allow you to lick my feet since I'm in such a good mood today. What? I can't believe you'd turn down such a great opportunity!
skins.acquisition: I'm in a good mood today, so I'm giving you special permission to lick my feet. Come on, show sincere thanks to my reward!
skins.secretaryIdle1: What? You want me to step on you that badly?
skins.secretaryIdle2: When I see you, Commander, I yearn to abuse you. Perhaps this is a form of love
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you unable to endure that much? Yes yes, lie down over there... Hmm? You want to be stepped on... is that what you're trying to say?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, are you looking for punishment again? Tonight I'll make you feel like you are in heaven and hell at the same time!

skins.shipDescription: Ahaha, that slovenly expression on your face proves I made the right wardrobe choice? Now then, Commander, can I offer you some wine?
skins.acquisition: Ahaha, that slovenly expression on your face proves I made the right wardrobe choice? Now then, Commander, can I offer you some wine?
skins.login: Commander, you're late. Don't you know the party already started?
skins.details: You are not to stray from my side at the party. Don't tell me you forgot the rules?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, have you forgotten you promised me a dance? Now watch your feet, unless you want to be punished?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Life is like this glass of wine. One may indulge in it... or one can spill it away. Which do you choose, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh? Is that Exeter over there? Ahaha, I have a few words for her.
skins.secretaryTouch: You want to see me drink? Ahaha! What an odd fetish... Here, have a goood look?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Did I not say you were only allowed to touch my waist?
